description: Creates a software bill of materials (SBOM) report.

parameters.name: reportFormat
parameters.description: The output format for the software bill of materials (SBOM) report.

parameters.name: resourceFilterCriteria
parameters.description: The resource filter criteria for the software bill of materials (SBOM) report. accountId (list) --- The account IDs used as resource filter criteria. (dict) --- A resource string filter for a software bill of materials report. The filter's comparison. The filter's value. ec2InstanceTags (list) --- The EC2 instance tags used as resource filter criteria. (dict) --- A resource map filter for a software bill of material report. The filter's key. value (string) --- The filter's value. ecrImageTags (list) --- The ECR image tags used as resource filter criteria. ecrRepositoryName (list) --- The ECR repository names used as resource filter criteria. lambdaFunctionName (list) --- The Amazon Web Services Lambda function name used as resource filter criteria. lambdaFunctionTags (list) --- The Amazon Web Services Lambda function tags used as resource filter criteria. resourceId (list) --- The resource IDs used as resource filter criteria. resourceType (list) --- The resource types used as resource filter criteria. The filter's value.

nested_params.name: accountId
nested_params.description: The account IDs used as resource filter criteria.

nested_params.name: ec2InstanceTags
nested_params.description: The EC2 instance tags used as resource filter criteria.

nested_params.name: ecrImageTags
nested_params.description: The ECR image tags used as resource filter criteria.

nested_params.name: ecrRepositoryName
nested_params.description: The ECR repository names used as resource filter criteria.

nested_params.name: lambdaFunctionName
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Lambda function name used as resource filter criteria.

nested_params.name: lambdaFunctionTags
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Lambda function tags used as resource filter criteria.

nested_params.name: resourceId
nested_params.description: The resource IDs used as resource filter criteria.

nested_params.name: resourceType
nested_params.description: The resource types used as resource filter criteria.

parameters.name: s3Destination
parameters.description: Contains details of the Amazon S3 bucket and KMS key used to export findings. The name of the Amazon S3 bucket to export findings to. keyPrefix (string) --- The prefix that the findings will be written under. The ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt data when exporting findings.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket to export findings to.

nested_params.name: keyPrefix
nested_params.description: The prefix that the findings will be written under.

nested_params.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt data when exporting findings.

nested_items.name: reportId
nested_items.description: The report ID for the software bill of materials (SBOM) report.
